sense.def:
To defy people or laws
pomeni ne ubogati ljudi ali zakonov.

To defy someone to do something
pomeni nekoga izzvati, da stori nekaj, kar se nam zdi neizvedljivo.

seg.quote: I defy anyone to disprove it.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
defies description or understanding
, je tako nenavadno ali presenetljivo, da tistega skoraj ne moremo opisati ali razumeti.

seg.quote: ...forces within the human character which defy rational analysis.
